issue.title: [C++][Compute] Revert support for Tables in ExecuteScalarExpression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12614](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12614). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11929 added untested support for evaluating expressions against tables to ExecuteScalarExpression

comments.body:
